
snap(20,-5,-5)

sky(185,200,255)
fog(220,220,200)
ground(70,13,5)

fadefrom(8000)

name(Laguna Roja)

nlaps(2)

set(10,0,0,0)p

set(1,1200,-13250,35)
set(5,1200,-12500,35)
set(9,1200,-11750,35)
set(3,1200,-11000,35)
set(4,1200,-10250,35)
set(2,1200,-9500,35)
set(5,1200,-8750,35)
set(0,1200,-8000,35)
set(7,1200,-7250,35)
set(3,1200,-6500,35)
set(9,1200,-5750,35)
set(5,1200,-5000,35)
set(4,1200,-4250,35)
set(8,1200,-3500,35)
set(6,1200,-2750,35)

chk(40,0,2800,0)
set(12,1500,5600,-30)p
set(14,3000,10150,0)pt
chk(40,3400,9750,-45)
set(10,7000,10150,90)p
set(14,11000,10150,-90)pt

set(38,5000,10150,90)
set(38,7000,10150,90)
set(38,9000,10150,90)
set(38,10550,9700,45)

set(38,11450,7450,45)
set(38,13000,7000,90)
set(38,15000,7000,90)
set(38,17000,7000,90)
set(38,19000,7000,90)

set(14,11000,7000,90)pt

set(14,9300,-15000,90)pt
set(10,13300,-15000,90)p

set(18,23000,-15000,90)p

set(10,0,-22400,0)
set(31,0,-18000,0)
set(10,0,-16800,0)

set(12,1500,-22400,-30)
set(10,3000,-16800,0)
set(30,3000,-13000,0)pr
fix(41,3000,-11000,-900,0)s
set(10,3000,-11200,0)
set(10,3000,-5600,0)
set(13,1500,0,30)p




maxt(9,15000,-2600)
maxb(9,-47000,-2600)
maxl(13,-5000,-44400)
